comments:
Driver:  Eclipse3.0RC2 (06/11 driver)

What you file is not possible ;-) the line numbers in the stack trace do not
correspond to 3.0 RC2 code.

Are you sure that you run on 3.0 RC2 (attach the build id, see Help > About
Eclipse)? We had some CCE some time ago but no longer in RC2. Can you provide
steps to reproduce and attach the files where you get this CCE?

Created an attachment (id=12478)
File having problem opening Java editor

I have problem opening Java editor for some files while others in the same
workspace would be fine.  Sometimes, after bringing down Eclipse and
rebootting, a file that used to fail to open in Java editor would be fine again
but another file would have problem.

Version: 3.0.0

Kathy, this is a VM bug. There is already a new IBM VM available. If you cannot
upgrade you can use the workaround that I described in bug 55814, comment 17.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 55814 ***
